name: test_e2e_with_logs[054_SQLI_BYPASS_005]
description:

| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_BYPASS_005` |

| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | bypass_waf |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |
